title: David and Goliath - Underdogs, Misfits, and the Art of Battling Giants
author: Malcolm Gladwell
description: In 'David and Goliath,' Malcolm Gladwell explores the dynamics of power and advantage, revealing how perceived weaknesses can become strengths in unexpected ways. The book delves into true stories of underdogs who have triumphed against odds and challenges conventional wisdom about what it means to be successful.
